item.title: Better Anki Usage Guide
item.author: zah@andrewzah.com (Andrew Zah)
item.description: As you may or may not know, I love Anki, the spaced repetition flash cards app.

item.title: Things to avoid with Anki
item.author: zah@andrewzah.com (Andrew Zah)
item.description: There are some common mistakes people make when getting into flash cards and spaced repetition for the first time.
